<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Find the first executable file \\p Name in \\p Paths.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This does not perform hashing as a shell would but instead stats each PATH</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// entry individually so should generally be avoided. Core LLVM library</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// functions and options should instead require fully specified paths.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Name name of the executable to find. If it contains any system</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   slashes, it will be returned as is.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Paths optional list of paths to search for \\p Name. If empty it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   will use the system PATH environment instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns The fully qualified path to the first \\p Name in \\p Paths if it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   exists. \\p Name if \\p Name has slashes in it. Otherwise an error.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/erroror">ErrorOr&lt;std::string&gt;</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#ae87ab32d0995f94193aff5e380c8d251"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#ae87ab32d0995f94193aff5e380c8d251">findProgramByName</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;StringRef&gt;</a> Paths = &#123;&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These functions change the specified standard stream (stdin or stdout) mode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// based on the Flags. They return errc::success if the specified stream was</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// changed. Otherwise, a platform dependent error is returned.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These functions change the specified standard stream (stdin or stdout) to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// binary mode. They return errc::success if the specified stream</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function executes the program using the arguments provided.  The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// invoked program will inherit the stdin, stdout, and stderr file</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// descriptors, the environment and other configuration settings of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// invoking program.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function waits for the program to finish, so should be avoided in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// library functions that aren&#39;t expected to block. Consider using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// ExecuteNoWait() instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns an integer result code indicating the status of the program.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A zero or positive value indicates the result code of the program.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// -1 indicates failure to execute</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// -2 indicates a crash during execution or timeout</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#abb13fbc7f52c659966b05092b19e6e19">ExecuteAndWait</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Program, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; Path of the program to be executed. It is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; presumed this is the result of the findProgramByName method.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;StringRef&gt;</a> Args, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; An array of strings that are passed to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; program.  The first element should be the name of the program.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; The array should &#42;&#42;not&#42;&#42; be terminated by an empty StringRef.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::optional&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;StringRef&gt;</a>&gt; Env =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">          std::nullopt, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; An optional vector of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; strings to use for the program&#39;s environment. If not provided, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; current program&#39;s environment will be used.  If specified, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; vector should &#42;&#42;not&#42;&#42; be terminated by an empty StringRef.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt;std::optional&lt;StringRef&gt;&gt; Redirects = &#123;&#125;, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; An array of optional paths. Should have a size of zero or three.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; If the array is empty, no redirections are performed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; Otherwise, the inferior process&#39;s stdin(0), stdout(1), and stderr(2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; will be redirected to the corresponding paths, if the optional path</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; is present (not \\c std::nullopt).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; When an empty path is passed in, the corresponding file descriptor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; will be disconnected (ie, /dev/null&#39;d) in a portable way.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SecondsToWait = 0, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; If non-zero, this specifies the amount</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; of time to wait for the child process to exit. If the time</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; expires, the child is killed and this call returns. If zero,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; this function will wait until the child finishes or forever if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; it doesn&#39;t.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MemoryLimit = 0, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; If non-zero, this specifies max. amount</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; of memory can be allocated by process. If memory usage will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; higher limit, the child is killed and this call returns. If zero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; - no memory limit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::string &#42;ErrMsg = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; If non-zero, provides a pointer to a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; string instance in which error messages will be returned. If the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; string is non-empty upon return an error occurred while invoking the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///&lt; program.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;ExecutionFailed = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::optional&lt;ProcessStatistics&gt; &#42;ProcStat = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; If non-zero,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// provides a pointer to a structure in which process execution</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// statistics will be stored.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> &#42;AffinityMask = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; CPUs or processors the new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">                                        /// program shall run on.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  );</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Similar to \\ref ExecuteAndWait, but returns immediately.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns The \\ref ProcessInfo of the newly launched process.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\note On Microsoft Windows systems, users will need to either call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\ref Wait until the process has finished executing or win32&#39;s CloseHandle</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// API on ProcessInfo.ProcessHandle to avoid memory leaks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo">ProcessInfo</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a76fe26a8f1401a60839398dedb2f170c">ExecuteNoWait</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Program, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;StringRef&gt;</a> Args,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::optional&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;StringRef&gt;</a>&gt; Env,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt;std::optional&lt;StringRef&gt;&gt; Redirects = &#123;&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MemoryLimit = 0, std::string &#42;ErrMsg = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;ExecutionFailed = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, BitVector &#42;AffinityMask = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// If true the executed program detatches from the controlling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// terminal. I/O streams such as llvm::outs, llvm::errs, and stdin will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// be closed until redirected to another output location</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DetachProcess = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return true if the given arguments fit within system-specific</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// argument length limits.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;StringRef&gt;</a> Args);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return true if the given arguments fit within system-specific</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// argument length limits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a8f03c560e53b510e60a472723126bb52">commandLineFitsWithinSystemLimits</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Program,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// File encoding options when writing contents that a non-UTF8 tool will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// read (on Windows systems). For UNIX, we always use UTF-8.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#aad87650fa22966074a3b341d0e5cef6c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#aad87650fa22966074a3b341d0e5cef6c">WindowsEncodingMethod</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// UTF-8 is the LLVM native encoding, being the same as &quot;do not perform</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// encoding conversion&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#aad87650fa22966074a3b341d0e5cef6caf0fd365beea6ebcbd1e26eb24015da53"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#aad87650fa22966074a3b341d0e5cef6caf0fd365beea6ebcbd1e26eb24015da53">WEM&#95;UTF8</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#aad87650fa22966074a3b341d0e5cef6ca4a36ece054fa83562738192455180088"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#aad87650fa22966074a3b341d0e5cef6ca4a36ece054fa83562738192455180088">WEM&#95;CurrentCodePage</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#aad87650fa22966074a3b341d0e5cef6ca89ceaeaaf604a94c4691ea915ada8c3c"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#aad87650fa22966074a3b341d0e5cef6ca89ceaeaaf604a94c4691ea915ada8c3c">WEM&#95;UTF16</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Saves the UTF8-encoded \\p contents string into the file \\p FileName</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// using a specific encoding.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This write file function adds the possibility to choose which encoding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to use when writing a text file. On Windows, this is important when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// writing files with internationalization support with an encoding that is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// different from the one used in LLVM (UTF-8). We use this when writing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// response files, since GCC tools on MinGW only understand legacy code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// pages, and VisualStudio tools only understand UTF-16.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For UNIX, using different encodings is silently ignored, since all tools</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// work well with UTF-8.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function assumes that you only use UTF-8 &#42;text&#42; data and will convert</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// it to your desired encoding before writing to the file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// FIXME: We use EM&#95;CurrentCodePage to write response files for GNU tools in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// a MinGW/MinGW-w64 environment, which has serious flaws but currently is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// our best shot to make gcc/ld understand international characters. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// should be changed as soon as binutils fix this to support UTF16 on mingw.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns non-zero error&#95;code if failed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::error&#95;code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#ae1fa64c0bf9c723c5960fdd815df37df"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#ae1fa64c0bf9c723c5960fdd815df37df">writeFileWithEncoding</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> FileName, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Contents,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#aad87650fa22966074a3b341d0e5cef6c">WindowsEncodingMethod</a> Encoding = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#aad87650fa22966074a3b341d0e5cef6caf0fd365beea6ebcbd1e26eb24015da53">WEM&#95;UTF8</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function waits for the process specified by \\p PI to finish.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns A \\see ProcessInfo struct with Pid set to:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\li The process id of the child process if the child process has changed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\li 0 if the child process has not changed state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\note Users of this function should always check the ReturnCode member of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the \\see ProcessInfo returned from this function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo">ProcessInfo</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a7defb51d8d6a2eba7a428d1a22f08bad"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a233737223c9a3dba810df5b91bc91d1fa49bfe5e1e40e44e387a5e03c6ca759c5">Wait</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo">ProcessInfo</a> &amp;PI, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; The child process that should be waited on.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">       std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; SecondsToWait, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; If std::nullopt, waits until</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">       ///&lt; child has terminated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">       ///&lt; If a value, this specifies the amount of time to wait for the child</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">       ///&lt; process. If the time expires, and \\p Polling is false, the child is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">       ///&lt; killed and this &lt; function returns. If the time expires and \\p</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">       ///&lt; Polling is true, the child is resumed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">       ///&lt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">       ///&lt; If zero, this function will perform a non-blocking</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">       ///&lt; wait on the child process.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">       std::string &#42;ErrMsg = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; If non-zero, provides a pointer to a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">       ///&lt; string instance in which error messages will be returned. If the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">       ///&lt; string is non-empty upon return an error occurred while invoking the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">       ///&lt; program.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">       std::optional&lt;ProcessStatistics&gt; &#42;ProcStat =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; If non-zero, provides</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">       /// a pointer to a structure in which process execution statistics will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">       /// be stored.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">       </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Polling = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; If true, do not kill the process on timeout.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  );</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Print a command argument, and optionally quote it.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if defined(&#95;WIN32)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Given a list of command line arguments, quote and escape them as necessary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to build a single flat command line appropriate for calling CreateProcess</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Windows.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/erroror">ErrorOr&lt;std::wstring&gt;</a> flattenWindowsCommandLine(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;StringRef&gt;</a> Args);</span></CodeLine>
